thread.title: Mars 'major science finding' to be announced by NASA
thread.title_full: Mars 'major science finding' to be announced by NASA

author: CBC News
title: Mars 'major science finding' to be announced by NASA
text:
Mars 'major science finding' to be announced by NASA Watch the NASA news conference LIVE starting 11:30 a.m. ET CBC News Posted: Sep 28, 2015 9:05 AM ET Last Updated: Sep 28, 2015 9:23 AM ET NASA's news release about the upcoming 'major science finding' was accompanied by this image of a region of Mars called Terra Meridiani. (Greg Shirah/NASA) Related Stories NASA news release (Note: CBC does not endorse and is not responsible for the content of external links.) 
NASA says it will detail a "major science finding" about Mars today that solves a mystery about the Red Planet. 
The findings will be released in a paper that will be published in the journal Nature Geoscience at 11 a.m. ET and is embargoed until then. CBC News will provide details at that time.
